form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Title: NARA Screening Form, Date: 9/25/2023, Form Number: N-4-000-00000-N

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/25/2023 29. The law provides that you may not be regarded as qualified for a) knowingly committed any crime for which you have not been arrested? naturalization, if you knowingly committed certain offenses or crimes, Yes No even though you may not have been arrested. Have you ever, in or outside the United States: b) been arrested, cited, charged, indicted, convicted, fined or imprisoned for breaking or violating any law or ordinance, including traffic (If you answer "Yes" to a) or b), give the following information as to regulations? each incident.)
